name: @shaunlusk/slgfx
description: Canvas graphics framework used by Shaun's JavaScript projects.
author: Shaun Lusk <shaun.lusk@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run test && tsc && webpack --config webpack.config.js && npm run build:docs && npm run build:tutorial
scripts.build:check: npm run build:docs && npm run build:tutorial
scripts.prepghpages: mkdir gh-pages && cp -r bundle demos docs index.html styles.css gh-pages
scripts.predeploy: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run prepghpages
